frame.name: Intentionally_create
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Creator</fen> creates a new entity, the <fen>Created_entity</fen>, possibly out of <fen>Components</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Creator">The Libyans</fex> were <t>generating</t> <fex name="Created_entity">arms</fex> <fex name="Purpose">for export</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an Agent intentionally creates a new entity. </def-root>

FE.name: Components
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the Components that are attached together to form a <fen>Created_entity</fen>. <ex>He <t>made</t> a jungle gym <fex name="Components">out of iron bars</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a depictive phrase describing the actor or undergoer of an action.</def-root>

FE.name: Created_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates. <ex>They were <t>generating</t> <fex name="Created_entity">grenades</fex> for export.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the creation event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Creator</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the Means by which a Creator intentionally creates a new entity.</def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the instrument with which an Agent intentionally creates a Created_entitiy.</def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition:
<def-root>The role of <fen>Created_entity</fen>.
<ex>This particular book was <t>created</t> <fex name="Role">as an introductory text</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Co-participant
FE.definition:
<def-root>A secondary agent with whom the <fen>Creator</fen> intentionally creates the <fen>Created_entity</fen>.
<ex>Emily <t>set</t> <t>up</t> the business <fex name="Co-participant">with the former president of Intersoft, Inc</fex>.</ex></def-root>
